mapper.select: SELECT EMP_ID,SCHEDULE_DATE,SCHEDULE_NAME FROM EMP_SCHEDULE WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND SCHEDULE_DATE BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{fDate}
SELECT dept_code FROM emp_info WHERE emp_id=#{emp_id}
SELECT SHEDULE_DATE,SCHEDULE_DEPT,SCHEDULE_NAME FROM EMP_SCHEDULE WHERE dept_id = #{dept_id} AND SCHEDULE_DATE BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{fDate}
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID,CONSULT_DATE,SCHEDULE_NAME FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE WHERE CONSULT_CODE = 'RG' AND CONSULT_DATE BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{fDate}
SELECT CUSTOMER_ID,CONSULT_DATE,SCHEDULE_NAME FROM CONSULT_SCHEDULE WHERE CONSULT_CODE = 'MK' AND CONSULT_DATE BETWEEN #{sDate} AND #{fDate}
